page.title: 04Lydlinch village 3
page.content: Continuing westwards along the A357 the more modern housing lines the road.There are two farms on the right-hand side and on the left, looking very obvious is{"Valentine {Cottage"}which is the only thatched roof to be seen. Taking the left turn signposted 'To Holebrook only' the rest of the village leads to the Church and the Manor Farm. If you continue down this lane you again cross the Lydden. Here you have the choice of a small bridge or a ford. The ford is a favourite play area for the local youngsters especially with their B.M.X.bikes.
